name: Solitaire Klondike Deluxe - classic card game
summary:
This brand new Valiprod app is modeled for a Mac and has a bunch of new features and can be comfortably on it !

The controls of the game have never been easier – you can start playing in just 1 click. Just hit “Start” and dive into this nostalgic classic where your goal is to rearrange the cards to fill in the 4 windows/cells in top right corner in an increasing order from Ace to King! Move cards by dragging them from one column to another and deal the cards to play them.

The game has 2 different difficulty modes – the harder mode you choose, the harder it is to win:

- Beginner. Deals one card at a time
- Expert. Deals 3 cards at a time

Klondike Solitaire by Valiprod features tons of fantastic options to diversify the gameplay and to contribute to hours of fun that you can have with this card game.

Here are some of the features designed just for you:

- Brand new design. Vintage game with an all-new look
- ‘Undo’ and ‘Hint’ buttons to help you out if you get stuck in the game. So with a little bit of patience you can master any game mode.
- Statistics window to make the game even more challenging

The above mentioned Statistics feature will show you the total number of games that you’ve played, the percentage % of your wins, total time you spent in the Klondike and many more!

So what are you waiting for? Download this awesome free card game and don’t forget to visit and subscribe to our Facebook page to stay in touch ;)
